title: J4 VS the juggernauts
body: So with the recent changes we are seeing these juggernaut picks a lot and I believe j4 has a kit that can shutdown these juggernuats although he may have trouble in the 1v1 toplaner vs them that is not the point my thought is that the juggernauts have to get to you and there biggest problem is getting there and that's why they are strong with your sivirs rightous glory support that allow them to get in. So my thought is that if you are able to ult said juggernait then flag and drag out this will shut them down harder then any other cc because you cannot cleanse qss or spellshield it.

replies.body: You're almost there. Juggernauts are countered most heavily by kite. Stuff like Janna, Azir Ult, Bard... Jarvan isn't really a kite champion, but his ult is so versatile you can use it that way.

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=AvREi4za,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-05T20:40:01.501+0000)
>
> You're almost there. Juggernauts are countered most heavily by kiting. Champions that can kite and slow such as Janna, Azir and Bard are effective against Juggernauts. Jarvan can't kite very effectively.

Couldn't have said it better myself.
BUT, taking J4 to trap the enemy op bruisers means one less op bruiser on your team dunking on the enemy
